means.word_mean: 1. a dusty wind from the Sahara that blows toward the western coast of Africa during the winter

auth_sentence.content: Inland the humidity is much lower during the time of the harmattan.

auth_sentence.content: The coast has southwesterly winds, the dry harmattan reaching right to the coast on only a few days.
